summary: Dole Food Company wages a campaign to prevent a pair of Swedish film-makers from showing their documentary about a lawsuit against the company.
cast: Alex Rivera|Alfonso Allende|Arvid Jurjaks|Bart Simpson|Bernt Hermele|Charlotte Lundgren|Dan Koeppel|David Magdael|Dawn Hudson|Jesper Osmund|Juan J. Dominguez|Ken Silverstein|Lars Åström|Lincoln Bandlow|Luciano Astudillo|Margarete Jangård|Mats Johansson|Michael Carter|Mikael Wiehe|Richard Bergfors|Percy Bratt|Timothy Burt|Fredrik Gertten|Sven Hughes|Peter Jäger|Richard J. Lee|Steven Rendall|Orvar Säfström
title: Big Boys Gone Bananas!*
